monitoring.heading: Select an IBM Cloud Monitoring instance to receive platform metrics
monitoring.generalDescription: Choose which IBM Cloud Monitoring instance will receive platform metrics from enabled service instances across IBM Cloud.
monitoring.fetchError: Failed to fetch IBM Cloud Monitoring instances.
monitoring.confirmInstanceChange: I confirm that I want to stop receiving platform metrics from {{instance}}

logging.heading: Select an IBM Log Analysis instance to receive platform logs
logging.generalDescription: Choose which IBM Log Analysis instance will receive platform logs from enabled service instances across IBM Cloud.
logging.fetchError: Failed to fetch IBM Log Analysis instances.
logging.confirmInstanceChange: I confirm that I want to stop receiving platform logs from {{instance}}
